name: conversations with birds (PROTOTYPE)
description:
this is extremely unfinished, you cant even talk to the bird which is kind of an issue considering the name, but you can at least walk around i guess Lmao. its something!! i had a lot going on and then hit a roadbump and i finished more art for it then u can actually see in this (will post some of it below) but. i didnt get it all together in time lol. whoops! i still am glad i tried and learned that next time i should just Try to team up with ppl and not do things entirely by myself just bc of whatever my brain thinks the issue would be. ok bye for now <3

player concept art

budgies :)

the second scene i was setting up, budgies and 2 other birds were meant to be in this one
